main.name: Welcome!
main.description: My name is Tanya Tabakova and I am a Front-end developer. I use HTML, CSS, Vanilla JavaScript and JS libraries such as React to create web content
main.bio: I love being involved in web development from start to finish. I'm experienced in HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap 3 & 4, Wordpress, JavaScript libraries jQuery and my latest used technology - React.
main.contactmessage2: Have a project for me? Think I'd be a good fit for your team? I'd love to hear from you, give me a shout by email or by using the form below if you'd like to get in contact with me.
main.contactmessage: Warning: Contact form is not yet configured, please contact me via normal email. Thank you!

education.degree: Google Developer Challenge Scholarship - Front-End Developer

work.title: IT Support Specialist
work.description: Windows OS administration - installing, upgrading and maintenance;
work.description1: Administrating and maintaining Microsoft Active Directory Domain Services;
work.description2: Executing weekly backups of software products databases;
work.description3: Resolving IT issues for employees to the best of my knowledge;
work.description4: Other duties, assigned by the Head of the IT Department.

work.title: Front-End / React Developer
work.description: Technologies used - React, JavaScript (ES6), CSS3 (SASS), HTML5;
work.description1: Worked on a project, based on ReactJS;
work.description3: The development environment included Agile methodology, ReactJS, Jira, Git.

work.title: Front-End Web Developer
work.description1: Developed, implemented and maintained front end applications with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, using today's best standards;
work.description2: Configured, installed themes, plugins, widgets and general WordPress administration;
work.description3: Provided development recommendations for all supported application technologies;
work.description4: Cross-browser and multi-device testing and performance optimization;

work.title: Front-End Developer
work.description: Technologies used - HTML5, CSS3 and JavaScript(ES6);
work.description1: Created and customized fully responsible websites from mock-ups;
work.description2: Frameworks and libraries used - Bootstrap & jQuery;
work.description3: Designed and implemented UI components using Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator and Inkscape.

projects.title: Arcade Game
projects.category: This is a project of a classic arcade game clone (like a Frogger game) accomplished as a part of Udacity Front-End Nanodegree and uses object-oriented JavaScript.

projects.title: Memory Game
projects.category: This project of a memory game app was accomplished as a part of Udacity Front-End Nanodegree. I used Vanilla JS to build this app.

projects.title: Panagro Ltd. website
projects.category: This project was created for a small agribussiness firm. It is build using the Bootstrap framework and the jQuery library.

projects.title: Blog Template
projects.category: This is a simple, but elegant blog template. It can be used with any type of blog and modified if it's necessary.

designProjects.title: Graphic Design project for a Jazz Event
designProjects.category: This poster was made for a jazz music event. My part in this project was to create the poster using Adobe Illustrator, with the design provided by another designer.
